summary: Soon after Thom starts operating as an illegal taxi driver in New York City, Claire hires him to drive her to California after her estranged father suffers a heart attack.
cast: Amber Jaeger|Sam Jaeger|Victor Garber|Cristine Rose|Lin Shaye|Bree Turner|Brennan Elliott|Michelle Krusiec|Eli Goodman|Amanda Lund|Avner Garbi|Dennis Romer|Frieda Jane|Ed Vaughan|Doreen Dunn|Geoffrey Nelson|Donna Williamson|Rebecca Jaeger|Charlie Jaeger|Clark J. Jaeger|Katie Jaeger|Jose Luis Perez Jr.|Christopher Weir|James Giordano|Steven Shaw|Opender Singh|Doug Purcell
title: Take Me Home
